1111441629217329152.text:
But at least Flat Earth decimates all other nutty conspiracy theories:

Conspiracy theorist: 9/11 was an inside job!

Flat earther: Dude, they're hiding the shape of the planet from us! 9/11 is just a date on a fake system of time-keeping for a fake planet.https://twitter.com/neiltyson/status/1111295662920888320 …

1111444556501782528.text: I can’t watch flat earth stuff ,it makes me fear for humanity .

1111446327383093248.text:
Oh it's insanely frightening.

But I feel like a certain calm must come over you when you accept a ubiquitous falsehood to existence.

"The earth is actually flat" is the new "We're all just brains in vats."
